tool_description:
Backend for shopping portal. Use these apis to create a sample shopping portal for Development purposes.  
The project has APIs for user, product, cart & images.

Create a partner & use the partnerId (uuidv4) as a header in All other requests 

These apis are suitable for developers who have expertise on UI but need a ready-made backend system to create shopping cart applications to practise their UI skills
name: Ecommerce Backend
title: Ecommerce Backend

api_list.name: Get Items from Cart
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get items from the `cart`. It uses `userId` for the particular user as path variable
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecommerce-backend.p.rapidapi.com/cart/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecommerce-backend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ecommerce-backend.p.rapidapi.com/cart/{userid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecommerce-backend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
